task.title: Assign an elastic IP address using euca2ools
task.shortdesc: In this section of the lab you will use euca2ools to assign a reserved public IP address to a specific instance.

step.cmd: With your instance running, assign the reserved IP address to your instance.
View the public IP addresses again.

info.p: Note that the IP address assigned to your instance was assigned by the user admin and not by eucalyptus.
Note that the IP address assigned to your instance has changed.
